Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; BURNED, OXIDIZED; PAINTED
Name: Vessel
Description: Ovoidal vessle with narrow mouth, rounded rim, long straight-walled neck and unstable convex base. Paste of a reddish colour and surface with yellowish coating. It has a painted decoration in wine-red, based on leaves, fruits and narrow and wide bands encircling the piece.
